-- Creating Person Table. CREATE TABLE PERSON ( id numeric NOT NULL, first_name VARCHAR(80) NOT NULL, last_name VARCHAR(80) NOT NULL, address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, gender VARCHAR(6) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) );
-- Person Sequence CREATE SEQUENCE seq_person MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 9999999999 INCREMENT BY 1 START WITH 1 CACHE 20;

CREATE TABLE BOOK ( id NUMERIC NOT NULL, title VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL, author VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL, publisher VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL, isbn VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL UNIQUE, price NUMBER(10,2), PRIMARY KEY(id) );
CREATE SEQUENCE seq_book MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 9999999999 INCREMENT BY 1 START WITH 1 CACHE 20;
